idea-plugin.name: Live SQL Query Explainer
idea-plugin.description: Plugin to explain SQL Queries inline with tips and visual query plans
idea-plugin.change-notes: Initial release. Features include SQL query explanation for SELECT, JOIN, WHERE, GROUP BY, etc., a persistent tool window for output, and sample SQL queries built in.

action.description: Analyze and explain SQL queries inline using visual and textual breakdowns. Includes support for SELECT, JOIN, GROUP BY, ORDER BY, and more. Great for learning and debugging SQL.
